title: ESA
content: So the thing is I ve really messed up in my first isa so I ve got to perform extremely well in the upcoming exams.How can I study to get atleast 80 in the ESA??(chem cycle)

comments.body: You'll get used to fking up exams in pes

Hope all you first years fail and don’t come to second year!
Good luck with that 
PS- it’s Pwn and not Porn

Glad to see someone on the same side man
